channel.title: Quire & You
channel.description: Tips and thoughts to help you achieve your dreams and get things done.

item.title: The Complete Guide of 2-Minute Rule by James Clear
item.dc:creator: Quire Marketing Team
item.description: If you find it hard to start a new habit or break one, the book Atomic Habits by James Clear would be of great help. Here are the detailed guideline on how to get started with the 2-minute rule and apply to your life.

item.title: Introducing Quire iPad App
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: Ready for an upgraded Quire experience on your not-an-actual-computer computer? It just works even better!

item.title: 7 Billionaires and Their Habits That Help Them Achieve Their New Year Goals
item.dc:creator: Quire Marketing Team
item.description: Want to be successful and achieve all those resolutions you have on your bucket lists? Here’s a list of the seven most famous billionaires and their habits that help them tick-off all their new year resolutions.

item.title: How to Smoothly Switch from Todoist to Quire
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: Effortlessly Switch from Todoist to Quire in only 3 pain-free steps! Pick up right where you left off and continue writing your dreams with Quire!

item.title: Introducing Dynamic Timeline: Illustrate Team Schedule and Achieve Success
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: We're so excited to introduce Quire Timeline. This feature was a long time coming, but we can't wait to show you how Quire Timeline goes beyond the traditional Gantt chart and fits as the lastest piece of Quire.

item.title: Quire Kanban Board 2.0 - Visualize Team Progress from Multiple Perspectives
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: Everything is better. Everything is more organized. Everything is more productive. All with Kanban Board 2.

item.title: Top 5 Business Tactics to Take into 2021
item.dc:creator: Quire Marketing Team
item.description: If you are a small business owner looking to give a boost to your business and recover from the sudden blow caused by 2020, then this guide is perfect for you. Here are five tactics that small business owners can put to use to kickstart their business in 2021.

item.title: You're Bad at Time Management, But We Can Help You Fix It!
item.dc:creator: Quire Marketing Team
item.description: This blog is going to explore the meaning of time management skills, in detail, with examples to help you understand the concept. Additionally, it will tell you how to use an underrated weapon- work management software, to boost your productivity without much effort.

item.title: Quire Rewind 2020: What Was Done? What’s Next? What’s to Expect?
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: In this blog post, we’re going to look back and reflect on the journey of 2020 at Quire. What we have done, what we have achieved and what’s more on the horizon for 2021.

item.title: 7 Productivity Rituals to Work Better Under Time Pressure
item.dc:creator: Josh Guilar
item.description: In this blog post we look at 7 productivity rituals that will help you work better and more efficiently with time pressure.
